channel.title: opera on Silviu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in opera on Silviu's Blog

item.title: Three browsers on a phone
item.description: The current state of browsers available for the Symbian operating system are a proof that there isn’t such thing as a one size fits all._ ****_You have the default browser, opera mobile, opera mini, skyfire and some others. I have installed on my e71 nokia phone Opera Mobile 10 beta, Skyfire and of course the default browser. I tried to settle on using just one but I just couldn’t. If I want to watch some flash video online or browse a really heavy site Skyfire is really the only option.
